name: PORTER AND KORVICK, P.A.
sampleDescriptions: Changes to the Foreign Narcotics Drug Kingpin Designation Act to allow for compensation to terrorism victims.  H.R.5954 and S.2946, the Anti-Terrorism Clarification Act of 2018
Implementation of the Antiterrorism Clarification Act 2019 - Public Law No: 115-253
Issues related to the ATA and TRIA.
